name: allip-mpmm
prompt: heroic tabletop fantasy (D&D 5e adjacent), grounded medieval-fantasy materials, culturally coherent gear, no modern tech or signage, consistent painterly collection style, Illustration of allip-mpmm, highlight musculature and unique limbs, include human silhouette, three-color palette, underwater/sky/merged zone, depict motion, detailed concept art, aquatic fantasy realism, subsurface caustics, bioluminescent accents, pressure-dome materials, palette: teals, deep blues, sea-greens, pearl highlights, Use specified aspect/resolution; avoid artifacts., Avoid embedded text or words unless specified; never render gibberish strings., Avoid garbled or random letter strings; keep any symbols meaningful or use numbered pins., Avoid sci-fi UIs, modern signage, photoreal CGI, anime style, bloom glare.
alt_text: Concept art of allip-mpmm with anatomy, scale, and environment.
revised_prompt: Create a detailed concept art in painterly style that depicts an alluring scene from a heroic tabletop fantasy. The scene should incorporate no modern tech or signage and comprise of grounded medieval-fantasy materials. Imagine a blend of underwater and sky zone where an allip-mpmm creature, highlighted by distinctive musculature and unique limbs, exists. Include a silhouette of a human for scale comparison. The scene should evoke motion and portray the realm's aquatic fantasy realism with subsurface caustics and bioluminescent accents. Materialize a concept of pressure-dome, incorporating teals, deep blues, sea-greens with pearl highlights in a three-color palette restriction. Ensure consistency in style and avoid any form of embedded text or words unless specified, modern signage, photo-real CGI, and anime style.
